summary: More Material Variants aims to expand the use of an armour style beyond the point where it would normally become obsolete. This is done by creating more material variants of your favorite armour, with each variant having better stats to reflect its stronger material.
descriptionHtml:
[img]http://static2.nexusmods.com/15/mods/110/images/49097-1-1387793287.png[/img]

[img]http://static2.nexusmods.com/110/mods/110/images/43085-2-1380385295.png[/img]
[center]What is MMV? Well More Material Variants is a solution to the problem which arises once your favorite armor is no longer strong enough for your needs. At this point you have to decide whether or not you want to keep your good looking armor or move onto something which doesn't look as nice. Well with this mod I aim to remove this decision by making More Material Variants of each of your favorite armors. So far I have MMV'd [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/43085/?tab=1&navtag=http%3A%2F%2Fwww.nexusmods.com%2Fskyrim%2Fajax%2Fmoddescription%2F%3Fid%3D43085%26preview%3D&pUp=1]Dawnguard Armor[/url] and now Blades Armor.[/center]

[img]http://static2.nexusmods.com/110/mods/110/images/43085-3-1380385295.png[/img]
[center]Each armor set has its own texture and improved stats. All of the armor pieces can be crafted and tempered.
This mod adds the following heavy material variants to Blades Armour:
Dwarven
Orichalcum
Steel
Ebony
Daedric

This mod adds the following light material variants to Blades Armour:
Elven
Glass
[/center]

[img]http://static2.nexusmods.com/110/mods/110/images/43085-4-1380385296.png[/img]
[center]The armour can be crafted, providing you have the relevant smithing perks and the book, or it can be obtained from Blacksmiths or found in loot. You will need to be of a high enough level in order for them to appear in shops though.[/center]

[img]http://static2.nexusmods.com/110/mods/110/images/43085-5-1380385296.png[/img]
[center]This mod does not require any additional mods or DLC.[/center]

[img]http://static2.nexusmods.com/110/mods/110/images/43085-1-1380385313.png[/img]
[center]If you enjoy the mod please endorse.

If you have any questions, suggestions or bugs please let me know in the comments.[/center]
author: Madrilous
